duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide clinical excellence in neonatology by delivering high-quality care to newborns and their families.
Drive quality improvement initiatives and participate in research projects to advance neonatal care.
Demonstrate leadership capabilities and pursue educational leadership opportunities within the NICU.
Contribute to evidence-based research projects and initiatives for quality improvement in neonatal care.
Collaborate with a multidisciplinary team to provide holistic care and ensure the well-being of newborns and their families.

education_certification.credential: MD or DO degree with specialization in Neonatology
